str2: Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
Of Hebrew origin; my master, i.e Rabbi, as an official title of honor.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A tent, booth, tabernacle, abode, dwelling, mansion, habitation. Apparently akin to skeuos and skia; a tent or cloth hut.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Or Moses, or Mouses of Hebrew origin; Moseus, Moses, or Mouses, the Hebrew lawgiver.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Elijah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Helias, an Israelite.
